name: Yummie Pastries: Sweetest Bedazzled Supermatch Three Game Free
name_original: Yummie Pastries: Sweetest Bedazzled Supermatch Three Game Free
description:
*THINK YOU'RE A PUZZLE MASTER?*

*TEST YOUR SKILLS & WIN GOODIES*

Connect as many same type pastries as you can. Close squares for maximum points! Sound easy? Its not, this game will be sure to challenge puzzlers of all levels! There are lots of modes to choose from limiting Time, Moves, and tons more bonuses and extras!

Unlock all the rewards to become a Gemi-Master! Challenge your friends and and post your scores!

Use Power-Ups to help get more points! Add More Time, More Moves, or choose to re-arrange the board to maximize score.

INCLUDES:
- Endless levels
- 20+ Awards
-3 Game Modes
- 4+ Power-Ups
- Share your scores

START COLLECTING GOODIES NOW :P
